    • Field Detail

      • Q_values

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> Q_values
        Table of knowledge used in the q-learning algorithm. Knowledge base is shared amongst all entities of same class in the world. The key is obtained by the method getQKey()

      • QRandomSelectionRate

        public static double QRandomSelectionRate
        This factor determines how probably will a task be chosen randomly instead of choosing the best task.

      • QIterations

        public static int QIterations
        Number of qiterations executed since the beginning of this game's execution. Currently with no proper use.

      • totalLMTasks

        final int totalLMTasks
        Total number of LM tasks this LMob is able to use
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LMTask_moveTowards

        final int LMTask_moveTowards
        List of LM tasks this LMob is able to use. Each number will designate the position of each task in the tasks array LMTasks[] from super class. Thus, values must be in the range 0 - totalLMTasks.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LMTask_moveAway

        final int LMTask_moveAway
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LMTask_basicAttack

        final int LMTask_basicAttack
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
